question: Who should attend this course?
answer: This course is suitable for anyone who wants to create active websites using HTML5, CSS3, Twitter Bootstrap 3 and jQuery can take this course.

question: What are the pre-requisites?
answer: For attending this Web Development certification training, delegates should have basic computer skills.

question: What will I learn in this course?
answer: In this course, you will learn advanced development techniques, syntax, variables, operators of PHP, fundamentals of jQuery, styling and formatting of HTML, and CSS for beginning web developers.

question: How long until I receive the course confirmation details?
answer: Once your booking has been placed and confirmed, you will receive an email which contains your course location, course overview, pre-course reading material (if required), course agenda and payment receipts

question: What are durations of the courses?
answer: Depending on the courses, they could be 3 - 6 months.

question: How will I get all the videos?
answer: You need to pay for the course and then all your videos will be available in your profile.

question: How much time do I have to give per day?
answer: You need to give 6-8 hours per day on this courses.

question: I do full time job, should I enroll in this course?
answer: If you can manage 6-8 hours everyday. Then you should enroll.

question: Is there anything about freelancing?
answer: No, there's nothing about freelancing. We focus on skill development and later job.
